comments.body: I think this is missing the iptables-restore commands
According to https://wiki.debian.org/iptables that's not necessary. (They automatically swap to match the iptables binary. I'm not sure why they make you update iptables and ip6tables separately...)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@
update-alternatives --set iptables "/usr/sbin/iptables-${mode}" > /dev/null
update-alternatives --set ip6tables "/usr/sbin/ip6tables-${mode}" > /dev/null

# Now re-exec the original command with the newly-selected alternative
